pageProps.title: 5. コントロールのレイアウト

mdBlocks.parent: 今回はコントロールをウィンドウ上にレイアウトする方法をお伝えします。
# ft.Row
まずは、複数のコントロールを横並びにする方法です。
[前章]()で紹介したウィンドウを例に説明していきます。

![%E3%82%B3%E3%83%B3%E3%83%88%E3%83%AD%E3%83%BC%E3%83%AB%E6%A8%AA%E4%B8%A6%E3%81%B3%E3%81%97%E3%81%A6%E3%81%BF%E3%81%9F.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/f74fe9ee-1751-495b-ba5a-5a04e5efbed7/%E3%82%B3%E3%83%B3%E3%83%88%E3%83%AD%E3%83%BC%E3%83%AB%E6%A8%AA%E4%B8%A6%E3%81%B3%E3%81%97%E3%81%A6%E3%81%BF%E3%81%9F.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466UU5KGOSO%2F20250317%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250317T130935Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjEO3%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJHMEUCIQCBWcizEotrgAQlbTcknbVFElWOUW5nvYPBkqvLvr6gmQIgONK1yda61xaa8A%2Fx6X%2Bi8yUtN1NY2SFWS8LL%2FXex098q%2FwMIRRAAGgw2Mzc0MjMxODM4MDUiDMp4NUqRcPcDfvhL%2BSrcAwZXZtTSa%2BReRaMyWAfIDbuF5jAIaQoWn1PCtTEj%2FboRn6gbxi43DIIBXHhYYV1VrRwy%2BLe5nKwH91GoB5U%2FApYfYJHBhBs87nkX%2F5b9pfD79aiOnrVh0aWyF0WtKeqCr3y3v3gMANLvdcSJox8Csg%2FNYf0cZGzlPydHhzojc26BihsQg%2F4ZHHtqQpx3Z0Qk%2FMqZyrWoEgqOXKie0x6wIxFtUjBzJ64WHZCy0nR1mEfRvjEm5ZbKFqZ3s7YYfZdU9A%2Fc88awI%2FucHf9EUG4x58w7kZm9i%2F%2BRWbuqRaMOVVgcUygixCaA1oH6uSsal21JolSA%2BMGqiD0gNxzZ5zDLPJWTwLt4mhqM%2FSALoyfm8KEyT4u5g09C369oFWZTLVR94dIbTkbZqPtlO1FlWXv0M1XJxVOy9JC0RzYxrJ6BFc1fxYBx2XNSuzkGx25ZLxQuTXpErLwSh764RoMMW4Wl3sixjhi29W0swp%2Byiyj%2BLMhdsjdbgrTE1VCfVSc7XTFINVXXR7cZjaO19H9X8g8FAkiOhkFodHwEjttODrjp146AQHHPrsS5a8ct7vtDcPblKeFXcOAtBRIeSX8mKMPTPhIYJArSmxCNBINPZJ0CXJcGOGPSgxcHYuRXBkpqMI6p4L4GOqUBuEf03qUeHzWkM0T6XbdAYA5SqlT%2BWtdU%2BLsz%2FSao3HD6Sx8l56gXIunDWwtSUQsEGAv%2Bosj%2FjCdiJaZ2uhaUtm7T0cp9Opscouc%2BbTfBzTjgDt9Hmf%2FkITmYidK9cLl1NlB2fn4hnETCRjwooefgJ7h0Kc9MvBgm3vuDUu4tK398JrSpCKFbfsND6vFhu5DChoYS4%2BxjrS4RkzBurQPXKGvZw2Pn&X-Amz-Signature=6b4354fec57eb1acc82bfea96506dedd92b824897efc808b38e0b885fee3468d&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
コントロールを横並びにするには**Rowコントロール**を使用します。
Rowコントロールのプロパティである`controls`に、横並びにしたい複数のコントロールを**リスト型**で設定することで、上記のようなウィンドウを表示することができます。

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
    icon = ft.Icon(
        name=ft.icons.DRIVE_FILE_RENAME_OUTLINE,
        size=38,
    )
    field = ft.TextField(
        label="名前を入力",
        height=43,
        expand=1,
    )
    button = ft.FilledButton(
        text="送信",
        height=40,
    )

    row = ft.Row(controls=[icon, field, button])

    page.add(row)

ft.app(target=main)
```
もちろん、このRowコントロールも設定できるプロパティを複数持っており、コントロールごとの間隔を設定できる`spacing`や、横並びにしたときの幅を設定する`width`などがあります。

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
    icon = ft.Icon(
        name=ft.icons.DRIVE_FILE_RENAME_OUTLINE,
        size=38,
    )
    field = ft.TextField(
        label="名前を入力",
        height=43,
        expand=1,
    )
    button = ft.FilledButton(
        text="送信",
        height=40,
    )

    row = ft.Row(
        controls=[icon, field, button],
        spacing=40,
        width=400,
    )

    page.add(row)

ft.app(target=main)
```
# ft.Column
次に、複数のコントロールを縦方向に並べる方法です。
これには、**Columコントロール**を使用します。**Columnコントロール**の使用方法は、先程のRowコントロールとよく似ています。
**controls**プロパティに、縦並びにしたい複数のコントロールを**リスト型**で指定します。

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
    icon = ft.Icon(
        name=ft.icons.DRIVE_FILE_RENAME_OUTLINE,
        size=38,
    )
    field = ft.TextField(
        label="名前を入力",
        height=43,
    )
    button = ft.FilledButton(
        text="送信",
        height=40,
    )

    column = ft.Column(controls=[icon, field, button])

    page.add(column)

ft.app(target=main)
```

![%E3%82%AB%E3%83%A9%E3%83%A0%E3%81%A7%E3%82%B3%E3%83%B3%E3%83%88%E3%83%AD%E3%83%BC%E3%83%AB%E3%82%92%E7%B8%A6%E4%B8%A6%E3%81%B3.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/eddf6382-abbd-4355-baf3-88f089aea8e0/%E3%82%AB%E3%83%A9%E3%83%A0%E3%81%A7%E3%82%B3%E3%83%B3%E3%83%88%E3%83%AD%E3%83%BC%E3%83%AB%E3%82%92%E7%B8%A6%E4%B8%A6%E3%81%B3.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466UU5KGOSO%2F20250317%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250317T130935Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjEO3%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJHMEUCIQCBWcizEotrgAQlbTcknbVFElWOUW5nvYPBkqvLvr6gmQIgONK1yda61xaa8A%2Fx6X%2Bi8yUtN1NY2SFWS8LL%2FXex098q%2FwMIRRAAGgw2Mzc0MjMxODM4MDUiDMp4NUqRcPcDfvhL%2BSrcAwZXZtTSa%2BReRaMyWAfIDbuF5jAIaQoWn1PCtTEj%2FboRn6gbxi43DIIBXHhYYV1VrRwy%2BLe5nKwH91GoB5U%2FApYfYJHBhBs87nkX%2F5b9pfD79aiOnrVh0aWyF0WtKeqCr3y3v3gMANLvdcSJox8Csg%2FNYf0cZGzlPydHhzojc26BihsQg%2F4ZHHtqQpx3Z0Qk%2FMqZyrWoEgqOXKie0x6wIxFtUjBzJ64WHZCy0nR1mEfRvjEm5ZbKFqZ3s7YYfZdU9A%2Fc88awI%2FucHf9EUG4x58w7kZm9i%2F%2BRWbuqRaMOVVgcUygixCaA1oH6uSsal21JolSA%2BMGqiD0gNxzZ5zDLPJWTwLt4mhqM%2FSALoyfm8KEyT4u5g09C369oFWZTLVR94dIbTkbZqPtlO1FlWXv0M1XJxVOy9JC0RzYxrJ6BFc1fxYBx2XNSuzkGx25ZLxQuTXpErLwSh764RoMMW4Wl3sixjhi29W0swp%2Byiyj%2BLMhdsjdbgrTE1VCfVSc7XTFINVXXR7cZjaO19H9X8g8FAkiOhkFodHwEjttODrjp146AQHHPrsS5a8ct7vtDcPblKeFXcOAtBRIeSX8mKMPTPhIYJArSmxCNBINPZJ0CXJcGOGPSgxcHYuRXBkpqMI6p4L4GOqUBuEf03qUeHzWkM0T6XbdAYA5SqlT%2BWtdU%2BLsz%2FSao3HD6Sx8l56gXIunDWwtSUQsEGAv%2Bosj%2FjCdiJaZ2uhaUtm7T0cp9Opscouc%2BbTfBzTjgDt9Hmf%2FkITmYidK9cLl1NlB2fn4hnETCRjwooefgJ7h0Kc9MvBgm3vuDUu4tK398JrSpCKFbfsND6vFhu5DChoYS4%2BxjrS4RkzBurQPXKGvZw2Pn&X-Amz-Signature=afb6ed753aae63a47ace8d747f6635c0bb80dfbe7cf53f9c2f5c7f8f3530b268&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
## Columnの用途
このColumnコントロールは、先程のft.Rowで横並びにしたコントロールたちをさらに縦に並べるために使われることが多いです。言葉だけではわかりにくいと思うので、画像とコード例を示します。

![%E3%82%AB%E3%83%A9%E3%83%A0%E8%AA%AC%E6%98%8E.jpg](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/4bb3cb72-12e7-4531-979c-c08187e3932b/%E3%82%AB%E3%83%A9%E3%83%A0%E8%AA%AC%E6%98%8E.jpg?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466UU5KGOSO%2F20250317%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250317T130935Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjEO3%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJHMEUCIQCBWcizEotrgAQlbTcknbVFElWOUW5nvYPBkqvLvr6gmQIgONK1yda61xaa8A%2Fx6X%2Bi8yUtN1NY2SFWS8LL%2FXex098q%2FwMIRRAAGgw2Mzc0MjMxODM4MDUiDMp4NUqRcPcDfvhL%2BSrcAwZXZtTSa%2BReRaMyWAfIDbuF5jAIaQoWn1PCtTEj%2FboRn6gbxi43DIIBXHhYYV1VrRwy%2BLe5nKwH91GoB5U%2FApYfYJHBhBs87nkX%2F5b9pfD79aiOnrVh0aWyF0WtKeqCr3y3v3gMANLvdcSJox8Csg%2FNYf0cZGzlPydHhzojc26BihsQg%2F4ZHHtqQpx3Z0Qk%2FMqZyrWoEgqOXKie0x6wIxFtUjBzJ64WHZCy0nR1mEfRvjEm5ZbKFqZ3s7YYfZdU9A%2Fc88awI%2FucHf9EUG4x58w7kZm9i%2F%2BRWbuqRaMOVVgcUygixCaA1oH6uSsal21JolSA%2BMGqiD0gNxzZ5zDLPJWTwLt4mhqM%2FSALoyfm8KEyT4u5g09C369oFWZTLVR94dIbTkbZqPtlO1FlWXv0M1XJxVOy9JC0RzYxrJ6BFc1fxYBx2XNSuzkGx25ZLxQuTXpErLwSh764RoMMW4Wl3sixjhi29W0swp%2Byiyj%2BLMhdsjdbgrTE1VCfVSc7XTFINVXXR7cZjaO19H9X8g8FAkiOhkFodHwEjttODrjp146AQHHPrsS5a8ct7vtDcPblKeFXcOAtBRIeSX8mKMPTPhIYJArSmxCNBINPZJ0CXJcGOGPSgxcHYuRXBkpqMI6p4L4GOqUBuEf03qUeHzWkM0T6XbdAYA5SqlT%2BWtdU%2BLsz%2FSao3HD6Sx8l56gXIunDWwtSUQsEGAv%2Bosj%2FjCdiJaZ2uhaUtm7T0cp9Opscouc%2BbTfBzTjgDt9Hmf%2FkITmYidK9cLl1NlB2fn4hnETCRjwooefgJ7h0Kc9MvBgm3vuDUu4tK398JrSpCKFbfsND6vFhu5DChoYS4%2BxjrS4RkzBurQPXKGvZw2Pn&X-Amz-Signature=90db02aad10fc5f5662b1cfe6d538f530e0755d083629428bf851fc11c700ace&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)

```python
import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
    datepicker = ft.DatePicker(
    )

    row1 = ft.Row(
        controls=[
            ft.Icon(name=ft.icons.DRIVE_FILE_RENAME_OUTLINE, size=40),
            ft.TextField(label="名前", height=55, expand=1),
            ft.FilledButton(text="送信", height=40),
        ]
    )
    row2 = ft.RadioGroup(
        content=ft.Row(
            controls=[
                ft.Radio(value="first", label="１回生", expand=1),
                ft.Radio(value="second", label="２回生", expand=1),
                ft.Radio(value="third", label="３回生", expand=1),
                ft.Radio(value="fourth", label="４回生", expand=1),
            ]
        )
    )
    row3 = ft.Row(
        controls=[
            ft.Text(value="学部", width=50, text_align="CENTER"),
            ft.Dropdown(
                options=[
                    ft.dropdown.Option(text="先端理工学部"),
                    ft.dropdown.Option(text="農学部"),
                    ft.dropdown.Option(text="社会学部"),
                ],
                height=55,
                expand=1,
            )
        ]
    )
    row4 = ft.Row(
        controls=[
            ft.Text(value="誕生日", width=50, text_align="CENTER"),
            ft.Dropdown(
                options=[ft.dropdown.Option(option) for option in range(2024,1900,-1)],
                label="年",
                expand=3,
            ),
            ft.Dropdown(
                options=[ft.dropdown.Option(option) for option in range(1,13)],
                label="月",
                expand=2,
            ),
            ft.Dropdown(
                options=[ft.dropdown.Option(option) for option in range(1,32)],
                label="日",
                expand=2,
            ),
        ]
    )
    row5 = ft.Row(
        controls=[
            ft.Text(value="キッカケ", expand=1),
            ft.Checkbox(label="Twitter", value=False, expand=1),
            ft.Checkbox(label="Instagram", value=False, expand=1),
            ft.Checkbox(label="ビラ", value=False, expand=1),
            ft.Checkbox(label="その他", value=False, expand=1),
        ]
    )
    
    column = ft.Column(controls=[row1, row2, row3, row4, row5])

    page.add(column)

ft.app(target=main)
```
